abstract: Zlatan Ljubijankić (IPA: [ˈzlatan ljubiˈjankitʃ]; born 15 December 1983 in Ljubljana) is a Slovenian footballer of Bosnian origin who currently plays as a striker for Japan's J. League Division 1 side Omiya Ardija and the Slovenian national team.
comment: Zlatan Ljubijankić (IPA: [ˈzlatan ljubiˈjankitʃ]; born 15 December 1983 in Ljubljana) is a Slovenian footballer of Bosnian origin who currently plays as a striker for Japan's J. League Division 1 side Omiya Ardija and the Slovenian national team.
name: Ljubijankić, Zlatan
